Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a pale red-brown pottery slightly grooved vessel with base of one handle surviving, the fabric is grey in section, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip and very faint traces of a black-painted text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (395010) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/395010)
